import React from 'react'; import { LineChart, Line, XAxis, YAxis, CartesianGrid, Tooltip, Legend, ResponsiveContainer } from 'recharts'; import { GrayScaleData, BrightnessBlock } from '../utils/dataParser'; interface DataVisualizationProps { grayScaleData: GrayScaleData; brightnessBlocks: BrightnessBlock[]; } const DataVisualization: React.FC = ({ grayScaleData, brightnessBlocks }) => { // 准备灰阶数据用于图表显示 const grayScaleChartData = grayScaleData.values.map((value, index) => ({ index: index + 1, value, position: grayScaleData.positions[index] })); // 渲染亮度数据块的矩阵热力图 const renderBrightnessBlock = (block: BrightnessBlock, blockIndex: number) => { const flatData = block.data.flat(); const maxValue = Math.max(...flatData); const minValue = Math.min(...flatData); const avgValue = flatData.reduce((a, b) => a + b, 0) / flatData.length; const nonZeroValues = flatData.filter(v => v !== 0); return (

{block.label}

32列 × 20行数据矩阵

{/* 矩阵热力图 */}

数据热力图

{/* 缩放控制 */}
显示模式:
💡 悬停单元格查看完整数值
{/* 列标题 */}
{Array.from({ length: 32 }, (_, i) => (
{String.fromCharCode(65 + i)}
))}
{/* 矩阵数据 */} {block.data.map((row, rowIndex) => (
{/* 行标题 */}
{block.startRow + rowIndex}
{/* 数据单元格 */} {row.map((value, colIndex) => { // 计算颜色强度 (0-1) const intensity = maxValue > minValue ? (value - minValue) / (maxValue - minValue) : 0; const backgroundColor = value === 0 ? '#f8fafc' : `rgba(59, 130, 246, ${0.1 + intensity * 0.8})`; // 蓝色渐变 const textColor = intensity > 0.7 ? '#ffffff' : '#1e293b'; // 智能数值显示格式 const displayValue = value === 0 ? '' : Math.abs(value) >= 1000 ? value.toExponential(2) : Math.abs(value) >= 1 ? value.toFixed(2) : Math.abs(value) >= 0.01 ? value.toFixed(4) : value.toExponential(2); return (
{/* 数值显示 */} {value !== 0 && ( {displayValue} )} {/* 悬停提示框 */}
位置: {String.fromCharCode(65 + colIndex)}{block.startRow + rowIndex}
值: {value.toFixed(6)}
强度: {(intensity * 100).toFixed(1)}%
{/* 箭头 */}
); })}
))}
{/* 数据统计 */}
数据统计

{minValue.toFixed(6)}
最大值
{maxValue.toFixed(6)}
平均值

非零值

高值

) : (

)} {/* 数据统计摘要 */} {grayScaleData.values.length > 0 && (

{(grayScaleData.values.reduce((sum, val) => sum + val, 0) / grayScaleData.values.length).toFixed(6)}

)}
